title: Please Love The Useless Me
resume: Michio is 30-years-old. She keeps looking for a job after her previous employer went bankrupt, but she is unable to find work. Michio still supports her younger boyfriend and her savings is almost gone. Then, Michio meets her ex-boss Ayumu. She was scared of Ayumu when they worked together. Ayumu now runs a tearoom which his grandmother ran. Michio decides to work part-time at Ayumu's tearoom. There, she various troubles everyday. Ayumu helps Michio, which allows her to see a different side of him that she never noticed before.
